answers.author: Nijah Fudge
answers.text:
Locate a computer recycling center in your community- Sometimes recycling monitors can be costly so if they are still in working condition donate them to a non-for-profit in need-, In my previous position of working for a non profit we dontated our old computers to "habitat for humanity restore"-  - Good luck

answers.author: Matthew Hankins
answers.text:
We remove the hard drives for security's sake and list them for sale them on publicly available sites, such as eBay and Craigslist.

text: What is the best way to dispose of or recycle used computers?
title: Used computers
